availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: A. Shelby Nunn (Henderson co. grocery clerk)

body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, grocer and clerk. Kentucky native. Clerk in Henderson County in 1850. Married Fanny B. Lambert Nunn in 1853. Grocer in Henderson County in 1863.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Division 1, stamped p. 279. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort, Kentucky, Roll #994038, Henderson County Marriages, p. 3. Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registrations, 1863-1865, Vol. 1: Kentucky, 2nd Congressional District, Records of the Provost Marshal General’s Bureau, Record Group 110. National Archives, Washington D.C., p. 437. Find A Grave, "A. Shelby Nunn (1832-1909)," Memorial #85173971, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=85173971&ref=acom (accessed 14 June 2016).
